data.body: Capture ship follow-up execution failures where the prior worktree CWD no longer exists (e.g., deleted worktree), then provide recovery: retry using the prior session id when possible and/or show a failure UI prompt offering retry.
data.description: Capture ship follow-up execution failures where the prior worktree CWD no longer exists (e.g., deleted worktree), then provide recovery: retry using the prior session id when possible and/or show a failure UI prompt offering retry.
data.title: Handle ship follow-up failure when worktree path is missing
